P

Phase - Class in controller.state
An abstract class for the Phase implementation of state pattern

placeArmies(int) - Method in class entities.Country
method to place number of armies
Player - Class in entities
Player in a game contains information about the continents and countries controlled by player, cards the player have, method to order input from user, queue to store player order and number of reinforcement armies player have.
Player(String) - Constructor for class entities.Player
Constructor of player which sets initial values for player data
PlayerStrategy - Class in strategy
abstract class that is implemented by concrete strategy classes This is the class that declares the method to be implemented by the various strategies.
PlayerStrategy(Player, GameEngine) - Constructor for class strategy.PlayerStrategy
constructor method for PlaerStrategy taking the name of he player and game engine object
PlayerTest - Class in entities

PostLoad - Class in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
Phase entered after preload class, it contains methods to add or remove players from game and to assign countries randomly to players.

constructor method that takes game engine object from the parent class
PreLoad - Class in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup

constructor method that takes game engine object from the parent class
